Title: Relates to requiring a health equity assessment to be filed with an application for construction or change to a hospital or health related service
Summary: Requires a health equity assessment to be filed with an application for construction, or substantial reduction of, a hospital or health related service; includes a demonstration of whether and how a project will improve or affect access to hospital services and health care with particular reference to members of medically underserved groups in the applicant's service area.
LawCode: Add ยง2802-b, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to health equity assessments in the establishment or construction of a hospital
